name: Client Project Review Notion Template
description: Carry out project reviews in Notion to help you learn, adjust, improve and focus on attracting your ideal clients. This notion template is a great way to wrap up any project. Customize it and make it your own!Tip: This can become really helpful when clients return to you. You have all the notes in one place to ensure your next experience with them is even better. If the project didn't go so well, the reminder might be to pass on this next project. Either way, it helps!
